import React,{Component} from 'react'; import { If, Then, ElseIf } from 'react-if-elseif-else-render'; import './employee.css'; import EmployeeID from './empid.js'; import axios from 'axios'; class Employee extends Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state = { firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", phone:"", gender:"", readEmpDetails:[], buttontext: "Create" } this.handleCreate = this.handleCreate.bind(this); this.handleRead = this.handleRead.bind(this); this.handleUpdate = this.handleUpdate.bind(this); this.handleDelete = this.handleDelete.bind(this); this.handleOnChange = this.handleOnChange.bind(this); this.FinalAction = this.FinalAction.bind(this); } handleReadEmpDetails (empDetail) { console.log('employee.js file handleReadEmpDetails() empDetail : ',empDetail); let empDetails = this.state.readEmpDetails; empDetails.push(empDetail); this.setSate({readEmpDetails : empDetails}); } handleCreate(){ this.setState({ [buttontext] : "Create" }) } handleRead(){ this.setState({ [buttontext] : "Read" }) } handleUpdate(){ this.setState({ [buttontext] : "Update" }) } handleDelete(){ this.setState({ [buttontext] : "Delete" }) } handleOnChange(event){ this.setState({ [event.target.name] : event.target.value }) } FinalAction(){ return( UpdateEmployeeDetails(this.state) ); } render() { return(
